custom-object.object-attribute: Export daily order file to ExactTarget FTP (for CP) and DataHub (for Converse)
Export daily order file on demand. Does not send file to any endpoint.
Imports Nike OMS Requests file from DataHub and sends to ET FTP (for CP)
Transfers files with inline and DYO order status updates from Genesco (via Datahub's sftp) and processed them
SCHEDULED for Prod - Exports US Catalogs and Prices before sending them to Reflektion
SCHEDULED - Import US inventory feed from Genesco
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for ES inline orders and imports it into the system
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for IT inline orders and imports it into the system
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for EU inline orders and imports it into the system
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for DE inline orders and imports it into the system

This is a placeholder for SFTP transfer of Nike employee verification file. We don't have NIKE credentials, and because of that use DataHub test SFTP to facilitate the transfer. NOTE: please DO NOT MODIFY THIS Workflow. Send all modification requests to converse-dev@tacitknowledge.com
SFTP Transfer of Weekly Employees file from NIKE
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for FR inline orders and imports it into the system
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for GB inline orders and imports it into the system

Reads csv file with Employee Records and then updates matching (by email address) User Profiles by updating its employeeActive and employeeID attributes. This job should run in each of the EMEA site (except for NL, which has a its own job to do this), because Employee eligibility is not site specific and we don't yet have Master Record in place to track eligibility across sites.
Import of Weekly Employee Data from Nike for EMEA sites
Export products_converse.csv to ExactTarget FTP (for CP)
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for NL inline orders and imports it into the system
Export RubberTracks registrations. Does not send file to any endpoint.
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for BE inline orders and imports it into the system
Export CSV of coupons and associated promotions to ExactTarget FTP (for CP)

The purpose of this job is the same as ImportEmployeeData. However, b/c we need to process the same file against all EMEA sites, but only archive one copy, this job will run the last for just one site, and clean up after itself by archiving the data file.
Import of Weekly Employee Data from Nike for NL site and cleanup
Exports Product Information Report to Converse FTP
Exports Performics product feed _ddi.txt for each EMEA site into local IMPEX folder without transferring them anywhere. Transfer to a remote SFTP host is done by TransferOut-Performics_EMEA workflow.
On demand job to generate perpetual inventory for all DYO products based on what is available in DE site catalog.
Create perpetual DYO inventory for EMEA sites
Daily import of Nike OMS requests for EMEA sites, which is used to update DYO order status
Import Nike OMS requests for EMEA
SFTP transfer of file with Nike OMS requests for EMEA from DATAHUB
This job runs a bit later than its counterparts on the other EMEA sites and performs a cleanup by removing the datafile after it is imported
Import Nike OMS requests for EMEA and cleanup
Daily export of orders from each EMEA site, run in the context of that site
Transfers EMEA performics report files to a remote SFTP host on files.fornova.net
